# RUN THIS AFTER RUNNING "summer-all.Rmd"

```{r}
my_data <- all_group

marine_quad_1 <- read_csv(here("data","surveys", "marine", "amelia_ritger_cbs_summary_2020_1005-quad.csv")) %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
    rename("species" = "species_lump",
         "site"="intertidal_sitename") %>%
  select("site","survey_rep","year","species","total_count","density_per_m2") %>%
  filter(site %in% c("Cabrillo III", "Alegria", "Lompoc Landing", "Bodega", "Fogarty Creek", "Sokol Point; Chilean Memorial"),
         species %in% c("Acanthinucella spp","Acanthina paucilirata", "Cancer antennarius","Cancer branneri", "Cancer jordani", "Cancer oregonensis", "Cancer productus", "Kelletia kelletii", "Leptasterias spp","Nucella canaliculata","Nucella emarginata; nucella ostrina","Pachygrapsus crassipes","Pisaster ochraceus","Tegula funebralis")) %>%
  mutate(species=ifelse(str_detect(species, pattern="Cancer"), "Crabs",
                            ifelse(str_detect(species, pattern="Pachy"), "Crabs",
                                   ifelse(str_detect(species, pattern="canth"), "Whelks",
                                          ifelse(str_detect(species, pattern="Lepta"), "Small stars", species))))) %>%
  group_by(site, year, species) %>%
  summarize(density_per_m2=sum(density_per_m2)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  group_by(site, species) %>%
  summarize(mean_density_per_m2=mean(density_per_m2))

#This doesn't include nucella though, so it's SUPER limited and probably not worth using...
```
